titleStmt.title: The fathers counsell. Or, Certain usefull directions, for all young persons, especially elder brothers, whose portion it is or may be, in these perilous daies, to be left in a fatherlesse or friendlesse condition. / By W.T.
titleStmt.author: Tipping, William, 1598-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for Christopher Meredith at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Thomason received his copy in October 1643.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octo: 14 1643"; the 4 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
